skills.name: Wooden plank
skills.description: (name character) took this wooden plank in order to start his path and try to defeat hsi enemies.

skills.name: deflm
skills.description: (name character) took this wooden plank in order to start his path and try to defeat hsi enemies.

skills.name: Psychic Terror
skills.description: Cthulhu invades the minds of those nearby, causing intense fear, hallucinations, and madness.

skills.name: Tentacle Crush
skills.description: Using his massive tentacles, Cthulhu crushes and constricts his enemies, dealing devastating physical damage.

skills.name: Oceanic Assault
skills.description: Deep Ones use their aquatic abilities to launch coordinated attacks from the water.

skills.name: Claw and Bite
skills.description: Deep Ones use their claws and teeth to maul their enemies.

skills.name: Slothful Corruption
skills.description: Tsathoggua releases a miasma that induces lethargy, weakening his enemies and slowing their movements.

skills.name: Voracious Maw
skills.description: Tsathoggua uses his cavernous mouth to engulf and consume enemies.

skills.name: Madness Aura
skills.description: Hastur emits an aura that drives those nearby insane, causing hallucinations, paranoia, and violent behavior.

skills.name: Eldritch Blast
skills.description: Hastur unleashes powerful blasts of energy that warp reality and cause severe physical and mental damage.

skills.name: Tidal Wave
skills.description: Dagon summons massive waves to flood and crush coastal regions, drowning and smashing anything in their path.

skills.name: Crushing Grip
skills.description: Dagon uses his immense strength to grab and crush ships, buildings, or individuals.

skills.name: Chaotic Emanations
skills.description: Azathoth emits bursts of chaotic energy that warp and destroy anything in their path.

skills.name: Reality Devour
skills.description: Azathoth consumes parts of the universe's fabric, causing areas to blink out of existence.

skills.name: Temporal Distortion
skills.description: Yog-Sothoth manipulates time and space, causing enemies to experience accelerated aging or temporal traps.

skills.name: Reality Shred
skills.description: Yog-Sothoth distorts the fabric of reality, causing areas to warp and unravel, dealing catastrophic damage

skills.name: Shape-Shifting Assault
skills.description: Nyarlathotep transforms into a terrifying form to directly attack his victims, inducing panic and confusion.

skills.name: Mind Corruption
skills.description: Nyarlathotep corrupts the minds of individuals, leading them to insanity or forcing them to act as his agents.

skills.name: Spawn Swarm
skills.description: Shub-Niggurath releases hordes of monstrous offspring to swarm and overwhelm her enemies.

skills.name: Fertility Curse
skills.description: Shub-Niggurath induces rapid, uncontrolled growth of organic matter, causing flesh, plants, or other substances to explode uncontrollably.

skills.name: Mind Control
skills.description: Yithians take over the minds of their victims, controlling their actions completely.

skills.name: Knowledge Overload
skills.description: Yithians bombard their enemies with an overwhelming amount of knowledge, causing mental collapse.

skills.name: Flesh Devour
skills.description: Ghouls bite and tear at their enemies, consuming flesh and causing severe physical wounds.

skills.name: Graveyard Miasma
skills.description: Ghouls exhale a toxic breath that saps the strength and vitality of those nearby.

skills.name: Dimensional Flight
skills.description: Byakhees transport themselves and their riders through interstellar space, causing disorientation and fear.

skills.name: Talon Strike
skills.description: Byakhees use their talons to strike and slash at their enemies.

skills.name: Engulf
skills.description: Shoggoths engulf their victims in their amorphous mass, crushing and digesting them.

skills.name: Protoplasmic Assault
skills.description: Shoggoths reshape their bodies into deadly forms, such as spikes and blades, to attack their enemies.

skills.name: Silent Abduction
skills.description: Night Gaunts silently grab and carry away their victims to unknown realms.

skills.name: Claw Swipe
skills.description: Night Gaunts use their clawed hands to rend and tear at their enemies.

skills.name: Brain Extraction
skills.description: The Mi-Go use advanced tools to extract the brains of their victims for experimentation.

skills.name: Stun Ray
skills.description: The Mi-Go emit a ray that temporarily stuns and paralyzes their targets.
